UnitDefinition.Name: Missing value imputation method types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Missing value imputation method types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Impute from data
Unit.Description: Replace missing measurements by random other measurements of the same substance, biological matrix and sampling type.

Unit.Name: No missing value imputation
Unit.Description: No missing value imputation, all missing values remain in the data set and samples with missing values will be removed before analysis.
